1.0.0.name: wordpress/dw-admin-footer
1.0.0.description: DW Admin Footer allows you to change the default WordPress footer text to something more suitable. My plugin, DW Admin Footer lets you customise you WordPress installation that little bit more. Only the site Administrators are able to update this text and it is shown to everyone who uses the backend of your WordPress installation. Ideal for use on client website but also for links to your website, contact information or corporate webmail. You can even leave the box blank to remove all text from the footer. If you have any problems or questions, please visit http://www.danielwoolnough.com/ and post on the forum or use a support ticket
